mapper.select: select role_id from acl_staff_role where staff_id = #{id}

select r.id, r.name, r.description, r.status, r.sort, r.gmt_create, r.gmt_modified, sr.id, sr.staff_id, sr.role_id, sr.gmt_create, sr.gmt_modified from acl_role r left join acl_staff_role sr on sr.role_id = r.id where sr.staff_id = #{id}
select distinct url from acl_resource r left join acl_role_resource rr left join acl_staff_role rs on rs.role_id = rr.role_id on rr.resource_id = r.id where rs.staff_id = #{id}
